verses.verse: And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that after <S%H6256><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> was expired, <S%H8666><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> that kings <S%H4428><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> to battle, Joab <S%H3097><s%> led forth <S%H5090><s%> <S%H853><s%> the power <S%H2428><s%> of the army, <S%H6635><s%> and wasted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> the country <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> and besieged <S%H6696><s%> <S%H853><s%> Rabbah. <S%H7237><s%> But David <S%H1732><s%> tarried <S%H3427><s%> at Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> And Joab <S%H3097><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> Rabbah, <S%H7237><s%> and destroyed <S%H2040><s%> it.

And David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the crown <S%H5850><s%> of their king <S%H4428><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> it to weigh <S%H4948><s%> a talent <S%H3603><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and there were precious <S%H3368><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in it; and it was set <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%> head: <S%H7218><s%> and he brought also exceeding much spoil out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H7235><s%> <S%H7998><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And he brought out <S%H3318><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were in it, and cut <S%H7787><s%> them with saws, <S%H4050><s%> and with harrows <S%H2757><s%> of iron, <S%H1270><s%> and with axes. <S%H4050><s%> Even so <S%H3651><s%> dealt <S%H6213><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%> And David <S%H1732><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H310><s%> this, <S%H3651><s%> that there arose <S%H5975><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> at Gezer <S%H1507><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> at which time <S%H227><s%> Sibbechai <S%H5444><s%> the Hushathite <S%H2843><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> Sippai, <S%H5598><s%> that was of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3211><s%> of the giant: <S%H7497><s%> and they were subdued. <S%H3665><s%>

And there was <S%H1961><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> and Elhanan <S%H445><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jair <S%H3265><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> Lahmi <S%H3902><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Goliath <S%H1555><s%> the Gittite, <S%H1663><s%> whose spear <S%H2595><s%> staff <S%H6086><s%> was like a weaver's <S%H707><s%> beam. <S%H4500><s%>

And yet again <S%H5750><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> at Gath, <S%H1661><s%> where was <S%H1961><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of great stature, <S%H4060><s%> whose fingers and toes <S%H676><s%> were four <S%H702><s%> and twenty, <S%H6242><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> on each hand, and six <S%H8337><s%> on each foot: and he <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> was the son <S%H3205><s%> of the giant. <S%H7497><s%>

But when he defied <S%H2778><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimea <S%H8092><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> him.

These <S%H411><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> unto the giant <S%H7497><s%> in Gath; <S%H1661><s%> and they fell <S%H5307><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his servants. <S%H5650><s%>
